item.title: Millions in crypto funded tools to exploit U.S. software, Treasury says in new sanctions
item.description: An Australian national was said to sell cyber tools designed for the U.S. government and its allies to a Russian company known as Operation Zero.

item.title: Solo Bitcoin Miner Nabs $200K After Renting $75 Worth of Hash Power
item.description: Despite incredibly long odds, someone scored a $200K BTC block reward after spending just $75 to rent Bitcoin mining power.

item.title: Longest Ether dip since 2022 ignored by whales: What‚Äôs next for ETH?
item.description: Ether whale order sizes are shrinking, while a $2 billion short cluster near $2,000 frame a tightening liquidity scenario for ETH after a sixth week of red price action.

item.title: Empery Digital shareholder demands sale of 4,000-plus Bitcoin treasury, resignations
item.description: A 9.8% shareholder has doubled down on calls for Empery Digital to sell its BTC holdings, return capital to investors and remove its CEO and board.

item.title: Fed proposes rule to deal with crypto debanking by scrapping 'reputation risk'
item.description: The proposal would cut the risk factor from Fed oversight and bar supervisors from pushing banks to cut off disfavored businesses, including in crypto.

item.title: From niche to $3 billion run rate: prediction markets eye $10 billion future, Citizens says
item.description: The bank said rising volumes, tighter market structure and early institutional engagement are pushing prediction markets beyond their gambling roots toward a new asset class.

item.title: WisdomTree Gets SEC Nod to Enable Instant Settlement for Tokenized Money Market Fund
item.description: WisdomTree is enabling instant settlement for its tokenized money market fund, indicating its product won't be limited by Wall Street‚Äôs pace.

item.title: Bitcoin retakes $64,000, crypto miners rally, as AI-related software rout eases
item.description: Sellers are taking a breather as bitcoin's Fear & Greed Index plunged to levels never seen before.

item.title: WisdomTree gets SEC approval for round-the-clock trading of tokenized MMF
item.description: The approval allows WisdomTree‚Äôs tokenized Treasury money market fund to trade and settle around the clock within the US regulatory framework.

item.title: Binance CEO hints at legal action over report on Iranian sanctions
item.description: Two major news outlets published similar reports on Monday claiming that Binance had fired or suspended employees involved in an investigation into crypto going to Iranian entities.

item.title: Stripe's Bridge sees stablecoin volume quadruple as utility insulates from 'crypto winter'
item.description: The payments giant says Bridge, its stablecoin arm, saw its transaction volume sky-rocket through last year as stablecoin adoption is decoupling from crypto cycles.

item.title: What NYSE‚Äôs exploration of onchain systems means for financial markets
item.description: Tokenized securities, 24/7 trading and onchain settlement could allow the NYSE‚Äôs blockchain plans to reshape post-trade processes in financial markets.

item.title: Better, Framework Ventures reach $500M stablecoin mortgage financing deal
item.description: The deal channels crypto liquidity into US home loans, testing whether blockchain-based capital can fund traditional mortgage markets at scale.

item.title: Trump‚Äôs White House Has One View of Crypto Legislation. His Family‚Äôs Crypto Company Has Another
item.description: World Liberty Financial is backing Coinbase on the crypto market structure bill debate, even as the White House criticizes the company.

item.title: Ethereum price drops to $1.8K as data suggests ETH bears are not done yet
item.description: Ether‚Äôs drop to $1,800 reflects weak technicals and onchain signals that point to continued downside risk as Ethereum ETF outflows persist.

item.title: Ethereum Foundation Starts Staking Treasury Amid Vitalik Buterin's ETH Sales
item.description: The Ethereum Foundation began staking ETH as part of new treasury operations amid a string of sales from co-founder Vitalik Buterin.

item.title: Bitcoin Traders Expect More Pain Ahead After BTC Falls 50% From Peak
item.description: Bitcoin dropped below the $63,000 mark overnight, falling more than 50% from its October peak as traders project a further dip ahead.

item.description: BTC price targets stayed bearish with a zone of interest below $50,000 as macro assets saw increasing downside pressure at the Wall Street open.

item.title: Nansen to set up Bhutan entity in Gelephu Mindfulness City
item.description: The blockchain analytics company will incorporate locally and hire in the kingdom's Special Administrative Region as the region advances its digital asset strategy.

item.description: The crypto exchange is bringing U.S. stocks closer to the crypto world, letting users trade derivatives of tokenized stocks around-the-clock and with 20x leverage.

item.description: The Tether-backed crypto payments app is expanding beyond retail spending with wallet-based off-ramps into domestic banking rails.

item.title: Bitcoin‚Äôs U.S. demand signal turns negative for a record 40 days
item.description: The indicator last printed positive on Jan. 15. Its failure to fully recover after a Feb. 5 rebound suggests U.S. demand remains structurally absent rather than temporarily paused.
